facts.text: [Etalius] ends his reign as Catholic Pope
Edward the Confessor crowned king of England
The first Parliament of Friuli is created.
Battle of Navarrete (Najera), English beat French
Explorer Juan Ponce de Leon claims Florida for Spain, 1st known European to reach Florida
Spain & France sign 2nd Treaty of Le Cateau-Cambr√©sis
French van Valois honored as duke of Gelre/earl of Zutphen
English Long Parliament passes the Self-Denying Ordinance, limiting regional armies, significant step toward New Model Army
English Lord Protector Cromwell refuses crown
Edmund Halley meets Johannes Hevelius in Danzig
Austrian Archduke Jozef crowned himself Holy Roman Emperor Josef II
George Washington receives honorary Ll.D. degree from Harvard College
